description: In a desire to get a working submersible to the Titanic wreck site as fast as possible, the Titan was built at a risk to safety, with cost-cutting measures and poor engineering permitted by CEO Stockton Rush, a former employee said.
title: OceanGate CEO put profits over safety ahead of Titan's fatal voyage, ex-employee says

description: A man was left moaning in pain after a handheld device appeared to explode in his trouser pocket while he was shopping for groceries in the Lebanese capital. With dozens of people wounded in similar circumstances across the country, Hezbollah issued a statement saying, “We hold the Israeli enemy fully responsible.”
title: CCTV captures Beirut explosion as pagers detonate across Lebanon

description: Hezbollah is advising the Lebanese public to stay away from handheld devices after reporting that pagers throughout the country had exploded. NBC News’ Raf Sanchez reports the Lebanese Red Cross is responding to widespread injuries across the country.
title: Hezbollah says handheld devices exploded causing injuries across Lebanon

description: Lebanese health officials warned the public to avoid using handheld communication devices on Tuesday after powerful Iran-backed militant and political group Hezbollah said pagers had exploded throughout the country.
title: Hezbollah says handheld devices explode across Lebanon; dozens reported injured

description: Zimbabwe plans to cull 200 elephants to feed communities facing acute hunger after the worst drought in four decades, wildlife authorities said on Tuesday.
title: Zimbabwe to cull 200 elephants to feed people left hungry by drought

description: Israel’s army released videos on Sept. 14 showing what were claimed to be strikes on various Hezbollah weapons storage facilities in Lebanon.
title: Israeli army video said to show airstrikes on Hezbollah weapons stores in Lebanon

description: Dominique Pelicot is charged with orchestrating the assault of his wife Gisèle Pelicot, drugging and offering her to a stream of men he met in a chatroom and filming the repeated rapes.
title: 'I am a rapist, like the others:' Husband admits guilt in trial that has shocked France

description: Israel has a new war goal, adding to mounting signs that the conflict could soon expand to the country's north as it warned the U.S. that “military action” would likely be the only way to addressing mounting hostilities with Iran-backed militant group Hezbollah.
title: Signs grow of escalation with Hezbollah grow as Israel sets new war goal

description: Japan’s government and people cheered the record trophy haul for period drama “Shogun” at the Emmy Awards as yet another win for their history and culture.
title: Japan celebrates record Emmy success for ‘Shogun’ as cultural win

description: During a televised election debate in São Paulo, Brazil’s mayoral race, candidate José Luiz Datena hit his opponent Pablo Marçal, a far-right influencer, with a chair after a heated argument.
title: Watch: Brazilian mayoral candidate hits opponent with chair during live debate

description: Three Americans are among the six foreigners to have been arrested after Venezuelan officials accused them of plotting to assassinate President Nicolás Maduro. NBC News' David Noriega explains the increasing tension between Venezuela and the U.S.
title: Venezuela arrests three U.S. Citizens for alleged plot to kill Nicolás Maduro

description: Days of heavy rainfall in Central Europe have prompted deadly flooding, with over a dozen people killed due to the storm. NBC News Gadi Schwartz reports on how authorities and citizens are managing the devastation.
title: How authorities are managing continuing flood threats in Central Europe
